# stopAnimating()

**Instance Method**

Stops the animation of the progress indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stopAnimating()
```

## Discussion

Call this method to stop the animation of the progress indicator started with a call to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/startAnimating()]. When animating is stopped, the indicator is hidden, unless [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/hidesWhenStopped] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing an activity indicator

- **startAnimating()**: Starts the animation of the progress indicator.
- **isAnimating**: A Boolean value indicating whether the activity indicator is currently running its animation.
- **hidesWhenStopped**: A Boolean value that controls whether the activity indicator is hidden when the animation is stopped.
